WorkItem.Description: Exception "An unhandled exception of type 'System.Reflection.TargetInvocationException' occurred in mscorlib.dll  Additional information: Exception has been thrown by the target of an invocation." occurs on the e.RaiseEvents( args ); line.  To reproduce load up the sample app, load several graphs, switch between them rapidly and hover mouse over graph while it is transitioning.

Comments.Message: I think I might have fixed (avoided) this in revision 31551.  The fix is a bit of a hack, and I think we need to investigate further and try to figure out a better fix, but at least it stops the exception from occurring when doing the hover.  I encountered this in my own codebase, but my use case was similar to yours, and this is the same place I think I saw the exception, so I suspect this is fixed.
